translation: Higher education after high school
An educational institution
Expression of precision
High quality
A language used in Arab countries
The study of Islamic law
Recitation of the Quran in the proper manner
Interpreting books and texts
Sayings of the Prophet Muhammad ﷺ
Study of the human mind and behavior
Study of the past and events
Study of the Earth and its regions

meaning: فَتْرَةٌ رَاحَةٍ مِنَ العَمَلِ أَوِ الدِّرَاسَةِ
translation: A period of rest from work or study
He think about something specific
He reflect on something
He start doing something

meaning: يَنْتَهِي الفصل الدراسي الجامعي الأسبوع المقبل.
translation: The university semester ends next week.

meaning: يَتَعَلَّمُ وَيَكْتَسِبُ الْمَعْرِفَةَ عَنْ طَرِيقِ الدِّرَاسَةِ
translation: To learn and acquire knowledge through study

meaning: سَأَحْضُرُ مُحَاضَرَةً مُهِمَّةً في مادَّةِ الرِيَاضِيَاتِ، وَبَعْدَ ذَلِكَ سَنَتَوَجَّهُ إِلَى الدَّرْسِ الثَّانِي
translation: I will attend an important lecture in mathematics, and after that we will head to the second lesson

meaning: أُحِبُّ الاستماع إلى رَأْيِكَ في هذه الفِكْرَةِ
translation: I would love to hear your opinion on this idea

meaning: هَذِهِ المَادَّةُ مُهِمَّةٌ جِدًّا لِفَهْمِ الْمَوَادِ الْعِلْمِيَّةِ بِشَكْلٍ أَفْضَل
translation: This subject is very important for understanding scientific subjects better

meaning: هَذِهِ المَعْلُومَةُ مُفِيدَةٌ لِفَهْمِ الْمَوَاضِيعِ بِشَكْلٍ أَعْمَق
translation: This information is useful for understanding topics in a deeper way
